response.original_title: Tie Me Up, My Dom CEO
response.overview: Top sex-toy designer Phoebe Thompson's got a dead bedroom and a dangerous solution--Dragged to an  underground sensuality dojo during a reckless girls' night out, she signs a contract with the club's  enigmatic Dominant ""K"", but it turns out the Dom reigniting her fire is her icy boss, CEO of Love&Passion.  Since then he's been testing her limits in boardroom and training chamber. Sparks fly when corporate  warfare collides with silk ropes, while her cheating husband's the least of her problems. This ain't Fifty  Shades- it's a Molotov cocktail of power plays, forbidden pedagogy,  and a woman's nuclear-level glow  up...‚Äù
response.title: Tie Me Up, My Dom CEO
